title: Star Wars: How to Write Character Arcs
author: Think Story
comment: 🍿 Want more Screenwriting Videos? Check out my playlist: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLY9KJ1cFVs7hcQCA0WMUJLQTCzmg8zcTB 🍿

Zuko
Ghost: Banished by his father.
Want: To restore his honor.
Lie: Capturing the avatar will restore his honor.
Thank you so much for this🙏

Luke: How did my father die?
Obi Wan: 49 Times we fought that beast...
A similar video explaining tragic hero/negative arcs would be much appreciated ;)
description:
Star Wars has some of the most iconic characters in cinematic history. In this video I examine how to write and create memorable characters and compelling stories through characters arcs.
